weekly_top_story.headline: Russia launches large drone strike on Kyiv ahead of high-level Ukraine-US talks
weekly_top_story.summary: Russia carried out a major drone and missile attack on Kyiv and other Ukrainian regions this week, underscoring continued escalation and complicating diplomatic efforts as U.S.–Ukraine discussions and international aid measures proceed.

stories.headline: Italy arrests nine over alleged Hamas funding through charities
stories.summary: Italian authorities arrested nine people accused of funneling funds to Hamas via charities, highlighting intensified international efforts to disrupt financing channels for militant groups.

stories.headline: Guatemala bus crash kills at least 15, government declares three days of mourning
stories.summary: A severe bus accident in Guatemala killed at least 15 people and injured many others, prompting a national mourning period and raising concerns about road safety and emergency response in the region.
